data.name: Fantasy Grounds - 5E: Heroes of High Fantasy: Greenskin Diplomacy
data.detailed_description:
When a band of orcs attacks the town of West Fork, will you and your party bravely defend the townsfolk, and strike back? This variable difficulty adventure module is designed for 4-5 players and comes with pregenerated characters and a full sized digital battle map.

This variable difficulty module is designed to act as a single session encounter or as a side quest to your existing campaign. The unique way it’s written and the various appendix sections present three difficulty levels to best suit your needs as a DM.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and the included 5E ruleset.

data.short_description: When a band of orcs attacks the town of West Fork, will you and your party bravely defend the townsfolk, and strike back? This variable difficulty adventure module is designed for 4-5 players and comes with pregenerated characters and a full sized digital battle map.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
